triggers.name: friend_add
triggers.trigger: CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `friend_count_incrementer2` AFTER INSERT ON `friend_add` FOR EACH ROW begin update user set friend_count = (friend_count + 1) where userid = new.userid_2; end

triggers.name: insert_history
triggers.trigger: CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `added_solarpanels` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if new.activity_name = "solarpanels" then update user set has_solarpanels = 1 where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `food_co2_savings_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ( (new.activity_name in (select item from activity_food)) and (new.alternate_activity in (select item from activity_food)) ) then update records set saved_co2_food = (saved_co2_food + ((new.alternate_activity_price)*((select co2_1kg from activity_food where item = new.alternate_activity)/(select price_1kg from activity_food where item = new.alternate_activity))) - ((new.activity_price)*((select co2_1kg from activity_food where item = new.activity_name)/(select price_1kg from activity_food where item = new.activity_name)))) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `saved_price_food_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ( (new.activity_name in (select item from activity_food)) and (new.alternate_activity in (select item from activity_food)) ) then update records set saved_price_food = (saved_price_food + (new.alternate_activity_price - new.activity_price)) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `saved_co2_transport_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ( (new.activity_name in (select vehicle from activity_transport)) and (new.alternate_activity in (select vehicle from activity_transport)) and new.transport_distance_km > 0 ) then update records set saved_co2_transport = (saved_co2_transport + ((new.transport_distance_km)*(((select co2_10km from activity_transport where vehicle = new.alternate_activity) - (select co2_10km from activity_transport where vehicle = new.activity_name))/10))) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `saved_price_transport_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ( (new.activity_name in (select vehicle from activity_transport)) and (new.alternate_activity in (select vehicle from activity_transport)) and new.transport_distance_km > 0 ) then update records set saved_price_transport = (saved_price_transport + ((new.transport_distance_km)*(((select price_10km from activity_transport where vehicle = new.alternate_activity) - (select price_10km from activity_transport where vehicle = new.activity_name))/10))) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `kwh_produced_solarpanels_updater` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((select has_solarpanels from user where userid = new.userid) = 1) then update records set kwh_produced_solarpanels = (timestampdiff(day, (select date_added_solarpanels from user where userid = new.userid), now())) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `saved_co2_solarpanels_updater` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((select has_solarpanels from user where userid = new.userid) = 1) then update records set saved_co2_solarpanels = ((timestampdiff(day, (select date_added_solarpanels from user where userid = new.userid), now()))*0.397) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `saved_price_solarpanels_updater` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((select has_solarpanels from user where userid = new.userid) = 1) then update records set saved_price_solarpanels = ((timestampdiff(day, (select date_added_solarpanels from user where userid = new.userid), now()))*0.17) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `saved_co2_temperature_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((new.activity_name = 'waterheater_off') and (new.temperature_activity_duration_hours > 0)) then update records set saved_co2_temperature = (saved_co2_temperature + (0.397*4*(new.temperature_activity_duration_hours))) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `saved_price_temperature_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((new.activity_name = 'waterheater_off') and (new.temperature_activity_duration_hours > 0)) then update records set saved_price_temperature = (saved_price_temperature + (0.17*4*(new.temperature_activity_duration_hours))) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `localproduce_co2_savings_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((new.activity_name = 'localproduce') and (new.activity_price > 0)) then update records set saved_co2_localproduce = (saved_co2_localproduce + (2*(new.activity_price)/4)) where userid = new.userid; end if; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `total_co2_savings_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin update records set saved_co2_total = (saved_co2_food + saved_co2_transport + saved_co2_temperature + saved_co2_localproduce + saved_co2_solarpanels) where userid = new.userid; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `total_price_savings_adder` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin update records set saved_price_total = (saved_price_food + saved_price_transport + saved_price_temperature + saved_price_solarpanels) where userid = new.userid; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `level_updater` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin update achievements set level = ((select saved_co2_total from records where userid = new.userid)/20) where userid = new.userid; end

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `sun_absorber_achieve` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((select kwh_produced_solarpanels from records where userid = new.userid) > 10) then update achievements set sun_absorber = 1 where userid = new.userid; End if; End

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `power_plant_achieve` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((select kwh_produced_solarpanels from records where userid = new.userid) > 100) then update achievements set power_plant = 1 where userid = new.userid; End if; End

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `3_years_ago_achieve` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((select kwh_produced_solarpanels from records where userid = new.userid) > 1095) then update achievements set 3_years_ago = 1 where userid = new.userid; End if; End

CREATE DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` TRIGGER `time_traveler_achieve` AFTER INSERT ON `insert_history` FOR EACH ROW begin if ((select kwh_produced_solarpanels from records where userid = new.userid) > 5000) then update achievements set time_traveler = 1 where userid = new.userid; End if; End

triggers.name: user
